definition: to transfer (income, profits etc) to higher authorities
on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
to hand in/to hand over/to seize

sentences.english: The banks shall accept the fines and turn them over directly to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 银行应当收受罚款，并将罚款直接上缴国库。

sentences.english: Two. The smoke all over, if, in violation of the regulations, all the housework by dad contracting.
sentences.chinese: 把烟全部上缴，如果违反规定，全部家务由爸爸承包。

sentences.english: There are various ways to pay state tax.
sentences.chinese: 国家税的上缴方式多种多样。

sentences.english: Macau's 17 casinos pay a 35% tax on their gross profits.
sentences.chinese: 澳门的17个赌场需要上缴总利润35%的营业税。

sentences.english: All penalties collected shall be handed over to the National Treasury, and may not be withheld by any unit or individual.
sentences.chinese: 罚款一律上缴国库，任何单位和个人不得截留。

sentences.english: The confiscated illegal income shall be handed over to the State treasury according to law.
sentences.chinese: 没收的违法所得依法上缴国库。

sentences.english: And such fees shall be turned over to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 收取的工本费和加注费上缴国库。

sentences.english: Perhaps. The overall tax bill from the industry might not be so distressingly low.
sentences.chinese: 整个银行业上缴的税款不太可能很低。

sentences.english: They have turned in all the weapons.
sentences.chinese: 他们已经把所有武器都上缴了。

sentences.english: In addition, the relevant department previously said plan raise profit ratio over scholars from renmin.
sentences.chinese: 此外，有关部门此前表示计划上调央企上缴利润比例。

sentences.english: Article 13 The law enforcement organs shall turn over the confiscated income to the treasury within 4 days therefrom.
sentences.chinese: 第十三条执法机关应当在4日内将罚没收入上缴财政。

sentences.english: The family says it has paid the fee in the past, but claims they simply forgot about it this year.
sentences.chinese: 这家人声称往年的费用都曾缴付，仅仅今年忘记上缴。

sentences.english: The property confiscated by the State security organs shall, in any case, be turned in to the State Treasury.
sentences.chinese: 国家安全机关没收的财物，一律上缴国库。

sentences.english: The property involved in the case will go to the public according to laws and regulations.
sentences.chinese: 没收的这些涉案财产，我们会按照法律规定上缴归公。

sentences.english: If the real estate transfer from premium, premium segment all to be turned over to the state treasury.
sentences.chinese: 如果该房地产转让产生溢价，溢价部分全部上缴国库。

sentences.english: He also agreed to forfeit about $2.28 million in money and property.
sentences.chinese: 他还同意上缴约228万美元的涉案财物。

definition: to hand over to/to give to higher authority/to seek connections in high places
to hand in/to hand over/to seize
to recover (illegally obtained property)/to seize/to capture/to force sb to hand over sth/to levy
